Author: LittleBookOfSorrows
Text: I cry eating apples because I'm sick of eating them and want something better.  I started to really want nice meals, but it feels so far away and eating raisins and apples is so frustrating.    You can become a "normal" eater again.  It takes a lot of work and tears, but it's worth it.  I relapsed but I'll get to eating tasty stuff again...eventually.    I share your frustration.  Eating disorders are grotesque and I know you'll be happier again.  x
